description: Resources available on Proxmox Clusters EdgeUno

targets.query: SELECT mean("cpus") AS "Procesors", mean("maxmem") /1073741824 AS "RAM", max("maxdisk") /1073741824 AS "DISK" FROM "system" WHERE ("object" = 'lxc') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "vmid", "host", "nodename" LIMIT 1
